alert.note: Alert for Real (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 26 at 2:09PM CDT until October 27 at 4:24AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...River flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of south central Texas, including the following counties, Edwards, Real and Uvalde. * WHEN...Until 800 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 158 PM CDT, The Uvalde County Emergency Manager reported flooding on the Nueces River between Barksdale and Camp Wood. The river gauge Nueces River at Montell has reported a 10ft rise over the past two hours. This rise will cause low water crossings along the river between Barksdale to Laguna to flood. Specifically this will affect low water crossings on State Highway 55, County Road 416, County Road 412, and County Road 410. This river rise is in response to a swath of 3 and 7 inches of rain from overnight heavy rain. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Camp Wood, Barksdale and Montell. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
